item.title: Unoriginal genius
item.description: “The world is full of texts, more or less interesting; I do not wish to add any more” This quote is from an article in the Chronicle Review. I highly recommend reading the article, particularly check out the section on the author’s “Uncreative writing” class at UPenn. The article is about how there is a trend in literature toward combining/using other people’s words to create new content.
